title: Drawing, "Rough sketch, possible altar arrangement, for Uris Hotel", December 19, 1950
medium: Crayon and graphite on cream tracing paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: 12/19/50 JE.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right: The altar doors could / open only at / a lower level but / it does not seem / as dramatic to / me. What do / you think? / JE (?); lower right: Possible altar / arrangement / Please return.
description: View of possible altar room with figure for scale.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rough sketch, possible altar arrangement, for Uris Hotel", December 19, 1950.
December 19, 1950. Crayon and graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-412.
